articles.title: Stocks edge higher as darker forecasts loom - Reuters
articles.description: World stocks inched higher, European bond yields dropped and the dollar held firm in light trading on Monday following warnings from the International Monetary Fund's managing director that a third of the world will fall into recession in 2023.
